description.ko: 계산과 혼돈 사이에 갇힌 세계를 묘사하며, 기하학적 완벽함이 디지털 카오스로 해체되는 과정을 흑백의 글리치 환경으로 담아냈습니다.
description.en: A study of geometric perfection dissolving into digital chaos, captured in a stark black and white glitch environment.

prompt: An infinite architectural cityscape of obsidian geometric cubes perpetually shattering into a torrent of #FFFFFF digital scanlines and #1A1A1A sharp shards. The composition features a complex balance of monochrome order and chaotic glitch art aesthetics against a stark #808080 void. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on shifting mirror surfaces. High-contrast cinematic lighting creates razor-sharp shadows, emphasizing the deep textures of digital noise and the fragmented complexity of a world caught between calculation and chaos.
